datasets.edge_id: specific computing infrastructure for this training
datasets.data_path: the path of extracted dataset, storage in edge or local network of edge

training_code.storage_ref_id: id of code that manages in storage service
training_code.module_name: code for training at edges, must be attached

pre_train_model.storage_ref_id: link to get pre-train model from storage service

history.status: enum of: completed, training, waiting, failure
